name: Never a Doll day
description:
My submission for the OpenGameArt Game Jam.

I was a little over ambitious with this project and never got to do all the things i wanted or use all the assets i wanted. It is unfinished and will have many bugs and errors i'm afraid but it is playable to some extent, enough to see what i was trying to make i hope.

enjoy! oh the inventory is temperamental, but works(ish)

thanks! :)
